Package eg

Class Edit

java.lang.Object
eg.Edit
public class Edit
extends java.lang.Object
The editing of text in an EditableDocument

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void clearTrailingSpaces()
    Clears trailing spaces
    void cut()
    Cuts selected text and stores it in the system's clipboard
    void indent()
    Increases the indentation by one indent unit
    java.lang.String indentUnitSelection()
    Gets the lastly selected indent unit
    void outdent()
    Reduces the indentation by one indent unit
    void pasteText()
    Pastes text stored in the clipboard and replaces selected text

    Performs a redo action
    void selectAll()
    Selects the entire text

    Copies selected text to the system's clipboard

      public Edit()

    • Edit

      public Edit​(java.lang.String indentUnitSelection)
      Parameters:
      indentUnitSelection - the initial value for the selection of the indent unit. The value can only be changed in setIndentUnit() and setIndentUnit(String)

      Sets the indent length from a selection dialog

    • setIndentUnit

      public void setIndentUnit​(java.lang.String indentUnit)
      Sets the indent length. Calling this method is not necessary if a document is set by setDocument(eg.document.EditableDocument)
      Parameters:
      indentUnit - the indent unit which consists of a certain number of spaces from 0 to 6

    • indentUnitSelection

      public java.lang.String indentUnitSelection()
      Gets the lastly selected indent unit
      Returns:
      the indent unit
